meanings.definition: A university lecturer who is not on the regular staff.
meanings.sent1: The privatdozent delivered an engaging lecture to the students.
meanings.sent2: The university invited a privatdozent to give a guest lecture on economics.
meanings.sent3: The privatdozent tried to teach his cat physics, but it seemed uninterested.
meanings.sent4: In the world of academia, a privatdozent is like a wandering scholar seeking knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The title of privatdozent carries a sense of independence and expertise.

meanings.sent1: The university will privatdozent him for his exceptional teaching skills.
meanings.sent2: She hopes the committee will privatdozent her after her successful presentation.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he would privatdozent his friend as the official history storyteller.
meanings.sent4: Being privatdozented is a significant achievement in the academic world.
meanings.sent5: The dean decided to privatdozent the young professor due to his dedication to research.
